"},{"id":186,"type":"Fake gambling/betting site","victim":"| steamname: royski4 - CSGOFunPot.com | steam3ID: [U:1:137487346] | steamID32: STEAM_0:0:68743673 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198097753074 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/royski4/ | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198097753074 ","accused":"Invalid SteamID","description":"This person added me to their friends list and since he claimed to be Polish , which is where I come from so I wanted to see why he wanted to add me. I went on chat, and he immediately told me he is an admin of CSGO jackpot site and he can easilly help me win by rigging the results. I responded in Polish as to why he is trying to scam me and asked him to read my profile info that says I do not accept requests from people that have anything to do with gambling. He responded with something similiar to the Polish word Thank You which is spelled Dziekuje, and as you can see he did not spell that right, but phonetically. This leads me to the conclusion that he does not live in Poland, and perhaps this is someone impersonating a genuine user from Poland, as well as with the tons of good +rep for trade he might be trying to scam people that way too. This is my first report , hope this is enough proof with the two screenshots I made, if not, please ask any questions anytime. I decided to now make a report about every scammer I encounter as since I started playing CSGO I have a lot of blocked people and not even 1/3rd been reported/have a steamrep or FOG ban. All the best, Raf, royski4","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/439fbd6ee1d8aeb12ddc53bb0g8912ba https://files.f-o-g.eu/77fggdc9g9474a3be3ae4g726eaf419g ","views":56,"protected":0,"locked":1,"state_id":9,"assignee_id":null,"creator_id":84,"modificator_id":84,"created_at":"07.09.2016 04:37:29","updated_at":"2016-09-07 10:31:46","state":"Invalid","assignee":"
